item.description:
A group tour of Somerville Open Studio Event spectacular on May 3 a joint event with the New England 25+ Social Fun group led by me as well.

Hopefully they will have a shuttle trolley like they did last year. Fo now the plan ok call it an SOS FUN Mission is to hit Joy Street Sudio CO-OP area first with over 40 studios first and take is from there. Joy Street Sudio is Somerville?s vibrant artist community on the other side of the McGrath Highway in the Brickbottom District.

Somerville Open Studios (SOS): Visit Somerville's Diverse + Vibrant Arts Community. Over 300 artists in over 100 venues will open their homes and studios for the Tenth Annual Somerville Open Studios Event on Saturday, May 3 and Sunday, May 4 2008 from 12 pm to 6 pm. During this free showcase for the arts, mid-career and emerging artists working across a broad spectrum of fine art styles and craft media ? including painting, photography, printmaking, sculpture, glass, fiber, jewelry, furniture and ceramics ? will exhibit their work to the public.
Visitors to SOS will be treated to displays of art in both traditional and non-traditional spaces throughout the city. Come see how Somerville's artists and entrepreneurs have transformed garages, real estate agencies, salons, cocktail lounges, and churches into both impromptu and permanent art galleries. Plan your visit by picking up a copy of the Somerville Open Studios map.
Web link to SOS: http://www.somerville...

Meet at 11:45AM parking lots at Joy Street Sudio 86 Joy Street Somerville, MA 02143 (617) 625-2572

Also, I added a Saturday Lunch after SOS Saturday, May 3, 2008 at 2:15 PM!
Cafe Belo 120 Washington St Somerville , MA 02143 tel (617) 623-3696
For more info and to sign up for this lunch: http://socialnetwork....
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at 11:45AM parking lot at 86 Joy Street Somerville, MA
item.why: It will be fun! Plus you can now be called Cool if you show! he-he
item.name: Somerville Open Studio Grand Tour
